description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. In this game the player is able to control time. As you progress, some of the items that you obtain will give you new abilities. Use these abilities to overcome enemies and obstacles, and try to reach the goal within the time limit.
description.short: In this game the player is able to control time. As you progress, some of the items that you obtain will give you new abilities. Use these abilities to overcome enemies and obstacles, and try to reach the goal within the time limit.
